title: Add logo to header, landing page, and app icon

requirements.text: Display the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) in the header/navigation bar of the application

quotes: Display this image to the Header/Navigation bar

acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears in the header/navigation area
Logo is appropriately sized for the navigation bar
Logo is visible on all pages with the header

requirements.text: Display the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) on the landing page of the application

quotes: Display this image to the Header/Navigation bar, the Landing page

acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears on the landing page
Logo is prominently displayed and appropriately sized

requirements.text: Set the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) as the app icon/favicon

quotes: Display this image to the Header/Navigation bar, the Landing page and teh App icon/favicon

acceptanceCriteria: Icon is properly formatted for browser display
Multiple favicon sizes are generated for different contexts (16x16, 32x32, etc.)

requirements.text: Save the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) as a static asset in frontend/public/assets
acceptanceCriteria: Logo is stored as a static asset
Logo file is accessible via public path

constraints: Use the exact uploaded image (image-1.png) without modifications

required: App icon/favicon in multiple sizes: 16x16, 32x32, 192x192, 512x512 (favicon-16x16.dim_16x16.png, favicon-32x32.dim_32x32.png, favicon-192x192.dim_192x192.png, favicon-512x512.dim_512x512.png)
